title: The owner shall demarcate the area in his plot which is occupied by the slum encroachments and transfer such land in the name of the Authority
clause_text: The owner shall demarcate the area in his plot which is occupied by the slum encroachments and transfer such land in the name of the Authority. The Authority on its own or through the Co-Op Housing of Hutment dwellers may initiate Slum Rehabilitation Scheme on the encroached area of Final Plot. Further, the Authority shall record the number of tenements, names of occupiers, area occupied of the time of granting permission.
section: Slum Rehabilitation Permissible on Town Planning Scheme Plots :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
